portfolio.title: About me
portfolio.text1: My name is Pedro, I'm { age } years old. I'm a Full Stack Web Developer.
portfolio.text2:
I have worked with web development since 2019, providing softwares to private security companies. The solutions I builded with my team have a daily impact on over 100.000 users around the world.

I am searching for new opportunities where I can apply my knowledge and experience built over the years and overcome new challenges.

ibna.name: IBNA WEBSITE
ibna.text: Website creade for IBNA SCS using PHP, JS, Bootstrap with the template Assan.

solutio.name: SOLUTIO
solutio.text: Participated on many private security projects using technologies such as: PHP, JS, HTML, CSS, MySql, Docker, etc...

dayz.name: DAYZ STATS
dayz.text: API developed with PHP to export players data from a Dayz Server to a web dashboard.

portfolio.name: Portfolio
portfolio.text: Portfolio developed with VueJS to display my personal projects and demonstrate my familiarity with the framework.

discord.name: Discord Login
discord.text: Login button that authenticate through discord API. Developed with PHP.
